alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 8:27PM CDT until July 01 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Clay County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Pemiscot County in southeastern Missouri... East central Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holcomb, or 8 miles south of Campbell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kennett, Portageville, Clarkton, Holcomb, Wardell, Bolton, Nimmons, Bell City, Carryville, Rhyne, Lorine, North Wardell, White Oak, Homestown, Ipley, Baird, Stanley, Frisbee, Swift and Peach Orchard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
